page.title: 10Tandridge Village
page.content: The village of{Tandridge}is roughly {4 miles }from {Oxted} ( which can be approached by the{A25}). There is a small Primary School for children aged {4-8 years,}with about 65 pupils. This is partly run by{ St.Peter's Church which is on top of Tandridge Hill. About half way down is a{Blacksmith's run by Mr.R.C.Larkin, & further down is {The 'Barley Mow',}a fairly large Public House & Restaurant with a big car park outside. The building is completely white. Next to it is where Sir John and Lady Burnett live. Their house has a long drive with a lodge at the beginning. Opposite is the{Village Hall}which is next to the School. This is used for weddings, discos and other events. All around Tandridge are fields used for grazing and growing crops.
